faq.question: AI強化はMLS写真ルールに違反しますか？
faq.answer: No, AI enhancement improves existing photo 品質 without changing reality. It's equivalent to プロフェッショナル photo editing, which is standard practice. Avoid misrepresentation by not adding 機能 that don't exist.

faq.question: AI強化は物件価値をどの程度向上できますか？
faq.answer: プロフェッショナル photos can help sell properties for 3-10% more. While AI doesn't directly add value, better presentation attracts more buyers and competitive offers.

faq.question: AIは悪い構成の写真を修正できますか？
faq.answer: AI can improve 品質 but can't fix poor composition or lighting. 開始 with well-composed photos and use AI to enhance, not rescue, bad shots.

faq.question: What 解像度 do I need for print media?
faq.answer: プロフェッショナル print typically requires 300 DPI. For large フォーマット printing, 150-200 DPI may be sufficient. AI enhancement can upスケール to meet these requirements.

faq.question: Can AI enhancement fix poorly taken photos?
faq.answer: AI enhancement improves 品質 but can't fix fundamental issues like bad composition or focus. It works 最高 with reasonably composed photos that need 品質 improvement.
